verbs.description: [ARG1: another norwalk man] [V: charged] [ARG2: with 19 m ‘ hamilton’ fraud] a norwalk financier was arrested tuesday and charged with a ponzi - like scheme in which he and others took money from clients to repay earlier investors in his hedge fund as well as for his own personal expenses through the hedge fund sentinel growth fund management he co - founded with mark varacchi jason rhodes 46 defrauded 25 investors of more than 19 million according to the office of the u s attorney for the southern district of new york varacchi also a resident of norwalk pleaded guilty last year to a ticket reselling fraud pegged to the hit broadway show hamilton and was sentenced to prison with co - conspirator steven simmons of wilton receiving a jail sentence as well for his part in the fraud norwalk attorney fraud steven simmons jason rhodes wilton u s norwalk connecticut mark varacchi stephen simmons new york fbi manhattan federal bureau of investigation
